content.detailedDescription: I was just watching a movie in my living room around 12 am when i suddenly heard my dog kept growling at something in our backyard for a few mins and he was just watching something outside from inside our living room so i decided to let him outside and went with him to discover this strange trail of green goo outside everywhere in our backyard so i decided to take pictures and document because it was weird and as i put the flash on my phone and took pictures i heard something rumbling through the grass and debris on our hill of our backyard and a weird noises that i haven't heard before that sounded like humming,pulsating and almost electronic sounding coming from the hill.I went inside shortly after then became curious and went back outside to document more but my phone was dying so i couldn't take a picture without flash anymore but got freaked out a little because i heard even more noises and felt like i was being watched-strange because i will never know what the heck that was,all i could kinda see was something slightly glowing with eyes- ohh heck no i've seen too many horror movies i'm going back inside haha
content.summary: So,my dog started growling from something outside in our backyard so i opened the door & me and my dog went outside to investigate.I found green goo everywhere and something was making a weird noise and rumbling on the mountain of our backyard weird......

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my back patio on june 11, 2017, about 8:10 pm est, watching airplanes go by with my husband. the sun was setting but there 
was still plenty of light. i was just commenting on how many flights go out of the airport daily. i was looking se, up at the clouds in the sky when i noticed something flying overhead under the clouds.The unknown craft, silver colored, teardrop on its side shaped, small airplane in size, was flying by approx 500-1,000 feet above the ground. i knew it was not an airplane. i observed no lights at all, i heard no noise at all and watched it fly by until it went out of sight. duration 20-30 seconds. i saw it very clearly. two planes were in the same sky at the same time with it. a commercial jet was flying far above going ne and a smaller white plane was flying lower going ne. the teardrop shaped craft appeared to have a destination as it flew in a straight line. it went by at medium speed and was not concerned about being observed by anyone. it was unidentified. it was flying on its own. it was smooth and had no wings or tail like a plane would have. it had no visible lights. it was a craft like no other on earth, a ufo. if i wasn't looking up, i would have missed it going by. my husband saw it too, but doesn't want to give his name. i have never seen or reported anything like this ever. the sighting was in jacksonville florida on a normal summers evening by the fire. we only observed it.
content.summary: Teardrop on its side, silver colored, flew by without any noise. no engine or smoke, no lights. planes in higher elevations at the same time of event.

content.detailedDescription: Seen 2 objects very bright were not moving but flickering was working looked up and just starred   lightes faded away rapidly in 5 min or less   no clouds or cover it was very strange  i very happy to share exp
content.summary: 2 bright lights not moving then faded in 5 secs w star in background no cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: The object was about a mile away when we first spotted it then it seemed to stop  change directions and then take off to the south west at a pretty good rate of speed i was going to follow it but i just loaded my truck with tree branches i tried to film it but it was moving around to much
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Spotted lights flashing to the south watched it move around for a while

content.detailedDescription: While walking dog and watching some fireworks, we noticed a red orb stop light color and size moving slowly east then it turned green stopped for a min turned red again moved slowly west slowed turned green stop light green size and color back to red, acted as if watching fireworks. moved back and forth east and west before heading west while solid green and very fast speed 3 times faster then local planes.
content.summary: Red stop light color stopped turned green moved east stopped turned red

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddy, as we were walking to my home, out of nowhere this huge maybe the size of a football stadium dome-like or egg shaped object appeared approximately 1-2 miles in front of us over treetop, the whole object/surface was lighted and glowing, we just stood there in shocked. it was hovering and gliding top of tree it made no noise or sound and it just glided away behind the tree, and about 20-30 seconds later it came out the same way again like it just flew in a circle, then it stop and hovered for about 10 seconds and it shot straight up into the sky.
content.summary: Huge dome-like object hovering and glided away over treetop

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding my bicycle just as dark was setting in.  i was traveling  in a southern direction when i noticed a white light crossing from about 3oclock to 11 oclock. it was a large light and at first i thought it might be just a plane coming in to our little airport.  i think we have vfr airport ...Anyhow just as i started watching it it seemed to fall from the sky. my vision of the object was interrupted as it went behind some tall cottonwood trees which where about 40 yards in from of me.  i quickly rode to the street...About 35 yards...Turned north for exactly one half block...Turned south again into the alley and rode to about the halfway point of the length of the block. i did not see anything where i thought the white light should be but just then my attention was captured by a red light off to my right.  it was very bright and at first i thought it was a roman candle as it is near the fourth of july.  but quickly i realized it was not a firework ...Maybe a drone,,,those are popular toys these days.....Anyhow  in seconds it rose straight up to a height of about 100 feet. silhouetted against the bitterroot  mountains which were a darker blue....Darker than the sky. it was silent. as it rose i could barely make out a boxy shape as it had two whitish lights on either side of the larger red lighted object. 

 as i struggled to get my camera working on my cell phone.....(i am not sure it i captured it on the video....) but i was trying to record it as it rose up further and headed off in a se direction. at this point it was traveling towards the se at about 200 feet.  at an angle of about 75-80 degrees above me. i rode to the end of the block...About 20 yards to get to a viewpoint that would allow me to watch it more....  just as i focused on it heading out ...It disappeared!  sky was still bright enough to see  this very plainly.
content.summary: I saw a red light climb straight up lit against the blue mountains behind then it flew away silently. then vanished with no lights or anything!

content.detailedDescription:
At 1134  11 pm. at night in salt lake city utah my camera woke me up because of intrusion in my yard i turned on the video on my ipad and my infrared camera was recording something i've never seen before  it was a beam of light that was covering the entire area approximately 2 feet in diameter with other white balls just sending from the beam as i watched it and recorded the whole process  the light captured   some white form in front of my camera and held it in the beam this went on all night long you must see the video it's unbelievable in the trees approximately 40 feet away from my exterior deck there was a disc shaped  object   in the trees shown in the video and as it moved it move towards the north there were other lights in my yard you must understand my yard is over an acre in size very large but the other lights there was no reason they should be there it's like this object was hunting   as it searched it grabs a hold of this energy thing  as seen in the video  and you could see it struggle in the light and pulled it into the light ,,this is however the first time i've ever recorded  on video 4 1/2 hours long must pass this video onto them that are more knowledgeable about what this infrared  light  the camera i purchased is one of the highest grade designs on the market 
 thank you for more  information see above
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: around 11:30 pm i woke up to my  rf camera at that time there was a beam of light that shot down into my yard on top of my building shed down to the neighbors buildings there was an entity that was captured by the beam i have it all on video iaround

content.detailedDescription: Heard a weird noise for abt half an hr like the sound of a muslim call to prayer mixed w an animal wailing in between fireworks earlier in the evening which was weird but i disregarded it..... a few hrs later i went to smoke a cigarette before bed and walked outside and around the house to see if there were fireworks still in the sky since it had been quiet for a bit and i needed to go to bed cuz it's getting late....Saw weird lights in the sky and stood there for a few minutes wondering what they were thinking maybe the lanterns ppl light or something....They kept blinking n pulsing n appearing and disappearing and it made me feel uneasy so i reached for my phone n videoed it though the video doesn't nearly show what i saw since it's so dark n in the sky but i'm not crazy i swear i wouldn't even put this here if i didn't think something odd was going on that i saw....This isn't the first time i've experienced things but the first time i'm telling it to anyone because i feel it's the right thing to do and keeping quiet isn't going to work much longer....
content.summary: Saw weird lights in the sky when i went outside to smoke a cigarette before bed.....Grabbed my phone after a couple min of being in shock n trying to figure out what i was seeing till i realized it wasn't right n grabbed my phone

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had just come back home and were getting out of our car after having gone to see a fireworks display with our child. we had left early because our child was frightened of the booming sounds. we had just gotten out of the car and i was unbuckling the back seat belt when i noticed what looked like a 1/2 circle of bright red lights in the sky. since we were just at a fireworks display, i was thinking this might be a neighbor who had purchased some kind of new firework, but they just stayed motionless in one spot. we, ( my husband and i) then noticed that the lights were slowly moving in unison in a circle to the left very slowly. after a few minutes, each one seemed to diminish or pull back. at that point i was thinking this must be some type of flare. finally, only one light remained visible and my husband tried to take a phone video, but said it was too far away and it just looked like a tiny dot on the screen. after this the remaining light moved slowly to the left- in a straight line and then seemed to fade like the others. my husband sent the video to our email and i was surprised and very upset to see that three lights are still visible on it, even though we both only observed one light at the time he was filming and the lights also appear white on the video and were very bright red when we observed them. they did not blink at all, just a constant red color. i also noticed some tiny flashes of light near the larger lights in the video and i did not see or notice those at the time of the video. i am trying to find out what this may have been. i am more skeptical than anything else, i just can't figure out what we were looking at tonight.
content.summary: Leaving our car to go into the house we saw four stationary red lights in a half circle arc shape in the sky across the street

content.detailedDescription: I live just a few blocks west of jordan creek town center in west des moines, ia.  just stepped out onto my deck which faces east and saw three solid red lights spaced equally apart from going across the sky from the south to the northeast.  no idea of their altitude (but they were high up in the sky) they were evenly spaced apart traveling fairly slow and took two minutes before they were out of my sight.  i didn't hear any noise coming from them.  the mall a few blocks to the east had a fireworks display earlier on the evening but this event ended at 2220 hours.  i'm confident that what i saw was not related to this event.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: Finished working in yard and was returning to house. looked up and saw object coming from south. bright lights no noise. it turned and started desending to the north again. i never heard any noise. so can it be a jet i ask myself. scared me so i went in house and locked the door.I called my friend and he told me put it on here and you would check on it.Thank you
content.summary: Object came from the south ,made a circle then desend south.

content.detailedDescription:
Here is my original email to mufon germany, then forwarded to graz.
i will translate it into english.



from: jacques 
sent: monday, september 07, 2015 4:40 pm
to: kontakt@mufon-ces.Org 
cc: jacques gmx 
subject: sichtung über 3 lautlose dunkel graue objekte mit ca 20-30m länge oder durchmesser vom sommerberg richtung stanz im mürztal

liebes mufon österreich team,

weiß nicht ob das jemand schon gemeldet hat, habe am samstag so gegen 17h das gesehen von meinen schlafzimmer fenster aus in der veitsch, steiermark.
dort ist auch mein pc und als ich wiedermal richtung stanglalm sah (richtung süden), wie schon unzählige male auch, sah ich das:

sichtung über 3 lautlose dunkel graue objekte mit ca 20-30m länge oder durchmesser vom sommerberg richtung stanz im mürztal fliegen/gleiten.
das fenster war offen und zuerst dachte ich es seien vögel weiter weg, weil es komplett ruhig war, flugzeuge machen ja lärm, hubschrauber auch.

sie flogen hintereinander wobei die ersten beiden einige 100m von einander weit waren (schwer ab zu schätzen gegen wolken) und danach (ca. 10 sekunden später) noch eins in der augenscheinlich gleichen höhe und in die gleiche richtung flog.

warum ich mir sicher bin dass es keine vögel waren und ich die länge/den durchmesser schätzen konnte ist der vorfall dass die durch eine elektrische wolke durch flogen, da es mehrfach bei allen 3 geblitzt hat!

jeder vogel stürzt da ab...Die flogen einfach geradlinig weiter!

das ganze dauerte ca 3-5 sekunden je objekt, habe dadurch keine fotos da meine olympus 800uz mindestens 30-45 sekunden braucht bis ich damit fotos schießen kann.

danke und lg jacques aus der veitsch, hochsteiermark

dear mufon team austria,

i am unsure if anybody has reported this already, on saturday (the 05.09.2015) around 1700 hrs i saw the following from my bedroom window in veitsch, styria.
i have my pc there and was looking again like countless times towards stanglalm (n.B. that is a local mountain south of my home).

i saw 3 silent dark grey objects approx. 20-30meters in length or diameter coming from the area of sommerberg flying/gliding towards stanz in mürztal.
my window was open and at first i thought i saw birds, it was absolutly quit outside, aeroplanes and helicopters make quite a sound.

the three flew in a straight line after one other, the first two a few hundered meters apart and the 3. about 10 second behind the second object at the apearently same height and direction.

i knew they were objects rather than bird when the flew through some sort of electrical cloud, i could see numerous flashes of light on the "skin"/outer grey layer on each object.

a bird would die instantly if caught in a lightning bolt and crash.

i saw each object approx. 3-5 seconds, that was to short to get my olympus 800uz, as it takes 30-45 seconds to fire it up..

cheers and kind regards jacques aus veitsch, highstyria.
content.summary: 3 grey ufos without sound flying from sommer mountain towards stanz through electrical cloud

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 6:27pm and i was sitting on my couch on the phone when i suddenly saw a moving oval object in the sky. at first i thought it was a balloon by the neighbor kids or a drone of some sort until it began swirling in the are in a 360º motion. i moved a bit to get focus on the object and noticed it was moving considerably fast. i walked outside to get a glimpse at the object and it continued to spin in a fast motion. as it flipped, the it reflected a bright light from the sun. the object was gold/orange in color, very metallic and bright. it was an oval shape in form a doughnut, thin layers and lots of space in the middle. no windows, writings or propellers on the object. the object made absolutely no sounds. planes were nearby but not close to this object. i was confused when i saw it and never came to mind it was a ufo until it started swirling. i lost sight as it moved north-east of my direction and disappeared in the clouds. as it gained distance, the object was viewed a solid dot in the sky. this is a true report and i wish i had my phone with me at the time, unfortunately my phone was charging and i was too amused and "shocked" to think about recording the event.
content.summary: Oval/doughnut shape metallic ufo

content.detailedDescription: Sightings happen on daily basis around 4:30 am til around 7am or so.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Same  light seen @ around same time daily.

content.detailedDescription: I had just left work at 7pm and entered rte 30w from rte 340 (old philadelphia pke)when i noticed an object floating/hovering in the air to my right through the passenger window. at first i thought it was a bird floating on the air but after watching i never saw it flap its wings (nor saw any wings). then i thought it might be some kids lost mylar helium ballon but it appeared too angular and seemed to move too slowly and changed direction. i pulled off the next exit at greenfield rd. and after pulling to tbe shoulder and backing up, as a tree obstructed my view, i took a picture and a short video zoomed all the way in with my samsung s7 cell phone. it seemed to hover and then move slowly east and then slowly change direction and moved west. it was a slightly angular/boxy/diamond shape and may have had a gray or silver diagonal line/angle from its top left its to bottom right. i was really confused about what it might be. a friend later suggested a drone but it seemed to move rather slowly. afterwards i thought i'd go to the top of the exit ramp, take a right and go in the direction i saw the object to try to get closer for a better look. however after passing the tree that temporarily blocked my view, and getting to the top of the ramp the object was no longer to be seen. i drove down greenfield rd for about a half mile till i found a safe spot to pull over, got out and scanned the sky but didn't see the object anywhere.
content.summary: Saw object floating/hovering and then it moved and changed direction slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on the roof of a house stargazing
2. the person with me 
3. ufo 
4. sail like objects connected with some sort of thin attachment, object seemed to hover momentarily, then continue on a path
5. vaguely alarmed but intrigued
6. it flew out of eyesight
content.summary: Sail like objects connected with some sort of thin attachment

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the back porch, relaxing after having dinner. as i normally take my binoculars with me to watch the aircraft fly over the house, i noticed a black spot to the north over the roy utah area, drifting in a southerly direction, i picked up my binoculars and sighted what i thought was a large bunch of balloons. i continued watching, but decided what i was seeing was not balloons, but a solid object. it was rotating in a counter-clockwise direction and maintaining a constant altitude. i noticed there was a silver attachment that appeared to move in and out. where this flap or port was, there where two panels that looked hot, or that had been hot, by the color.
 
the object appeared black in color, except for the port which was silver, and the two panels on either side and below it. it had four identical arms around it that were parallel to the ground, and a single arm of equal size in the center above and below its four arms perpendicular to the ground.

as the object came closer, i grabbed my phone thinking i could get a video of it. as i turned on the video the object disappeared from view. i ran the video for 3 minutes then turned it off as the object was not in sight. up to this point i had been watching the object for about 15 minutes. i sat back in my chair and noticed it again about 300 yards to the right of where i seen it last and again tried to video it, but it blinked out as my camera came on and i did not see it anymore after that.

i decided to make a sketch of what i had seen so i am attaching that as well. the object appeared to be about 30 ft across.
content.summary: Noticed black dot in sky to the north east of house. grabbed binoculars to view object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front porch listening to radio looking at the buitful clouds over top facing my house looking over top to left when 3 silver very whiney disc were flying in an out of cloud first one then two many fast course changes then a third.  they all went different directions up then down back an fourth then 2 disapered up in to clouds one took off toward dry ridge ky disapered out of,sight..
had no idea at time what to think or what it was not from here thow was a bit amazed i seen such a strange thing in the sky 
still look up there have seen nothen again
content.summary: 3 silver disc many course changes in an out of clouds pretty day puffy cloud  warm out

content.detailedDescription: El pasado 28 de mayo de 2017  a eso de las 13 horas pm  1pm de la tarde hora local de mi ciuadad armenia,quindio,colombia,me encontraba en la sala de mi casa experimentando con una lente infrarrojo en la camara de mi tablet la cual fije con vista al firmamento,inice a grabar apartir de las 2:30 pm 0 14:30 pm hora local hasta aproximadamente pasadas las 5:20 pm o 17:20 pm.,en un comienzo a simple vista no note nada anormal ni fuera de lo comun o que me paresiera extraño,grabe unos 10 videos de prueba solo por la curiosidad de ver mas tarde los videos a ver que habia captado la camara de la tablet adaptada con lente infrarrojo.En horas de la noche revise uno a uno cada video  pausandolos y viendolos en camara lenta y en dos de los 10 videos pude notar esferas traslucidas luminosas pero en uno de esos dos videos pude notar con asombro como en los primeros 3:08,3:09 al 3:10 minutos un extraño objecto de aspecto grisaseo plateado crusa el cuadro de enfoque a gran velocidad ,y en ese mismo minuto 3:52 al minuto 3:53 casi llegando al minuto 3:54 una segunda esfera luminosa aparese en la toma en lo alto de la nube arriba del cielo donde el cuadro de enfoque de la tablet limita la copa de un arbol por la ventana y un poste de energia,alcomienzo cuando vi el video lentamente y pausando las tomas penese que podria tratarse de alguna ave o insecto o desenfoque o reflejo producido por el infrarrojo,pero al verlo mas detalladamente mi curiosidad cresio y mi asombro fue mayor al definitivamente poder distinguir forma y aspecto del objecto asi mismo como deducir su posible velocidad al descender y cambiar su trayectoria conservando tan asombrosa velocidad,el objecto aparese en lo alto de la pequeña nube en el cielo entre la toma que hace la lente entre la copa del arbol y el poste de energia,desciende con rapidez,depronto emite un destello de luz el cual capta con gran clarida la lente y queda en la grabacion del video,luego sobre ese mismo descenso y a conservando esa gran velocidad el objecto hace un giro brusco hacia la derecha en direccion alta en el cielo por detras de la toma del poste de energia,en el momento de hacer el giro a la ves emite un segunto destello de luz el cual parese ser alguna especie de pulsacion producidad por la energia que lo propulsa o impulsa la cual se torna de un color blancusco con tono azulado.Una ves el extraño objecto gira hacia la derecha en su descenso este pasa por el cuadro de toma de grabacion a un lado del poste de energia en lo alto por la parte trasera de dicho poste de energia y se pierde en la toma de grabacion debido a que la camara ya no lo alcanza a captar dentro del rango de enfoque de toma.Y como dato aun mas extraño entre los tiempos previos a la toma en que aperese el extraño objecto y despues de que este pasa en lo alto y es captado por la camara modificada a infrarrojo de la tablet ,el dispositivo alpareser presento variaciones e inestabilidad de grabacion que aun no logro explicar,una especie de fuerza electromagnetica o pulsacion paresio afectarla al momento de captar y lograr grabar al objecto.Hice algunas capturas de pantalla de los tiempos de pausa dentro del video donde se puede claramente distinguir su aspecto y su forma,asi mismo como del momento en que aparese en lo alto,empieza su descenso y gira hacia la derecha emitiendo esa luz rara.Asi mismo hice una copia del archivo original al cual le disminui la velocidad de grabado o lo ralentise para hacer mas facil la visualizacion del fenomeno en los tiempos dados del video.
content.summary: Esferas luminosas de aspecto rombo o circular grisaseo metalico opaco en la sombra y plateado al reflejar la luz del sol.

content.detailedDescription:
On 1 july 2017 at approximately 2045, i was standing alone in my driveway smoking a cigarette when i noticed one of my neighbors was flying his small drone/rc aircraft around the neighborhood. i was watching the drone fly over another neighbors house when i noticed a second object appeared from behind the house.

my initial impression was this object was oddly shaped, being much taller (vertical plane) and much shorter (horizontal plane) in it's silouette than any aircraft i am familiar with. from it's silouette, i concluded it was likely a large bird flying at a very steep bank over the woods near the neighborhood. i then returned my attention to the drone now flying near my house.

after a few seconds, the drone disappeared from my view and i glanced back at the other object. i noticed despite it appearing to be in a steep bank, it seemed to be flying straight and level. at this point i determined this was not a bird as i previously assumed, and noticed the object appeared to be two similarly shaped objects tethered or connected together, one on top of the other. 

the object looked rounded or egg shaped, with a second rounded/egg shaped object immediately below it. between the two egg sections was a solid structure appearing to connect the two together. i could not determine whether this was a single object or two objects, but i distinctly remember the solid structure linking the two rounded sections together. the object was dark in appearance, perhaps dull black or another very dark color.

at this point i became very interested in the object and i wanted to get a closer look. i started filming the object with my cell phone at maximum zoom (x8). i also (accidentally) took a still photo with my phone prior to taking the video. i will attached both of these files to this report 

i filmed the object for almost two minutes as it traveled at a moderate rate of speed from west to east. the sun was very low on the horizon at this time, and i noted that there was no visible glint or reflection of the sunlight from the object. 

a few moments after i stopped filming, a small single engine airplane flew over the house traveling south. this aircraft had all of it's navigation and anti-collision lights on and i immediately realized i did not see any sign of such lighting on the object i filmed. there was no noise heard from the object nor any other emissions observed. i could not see any normal aircraft parts on the object (no rotor blades, propellers, wings, stabilizers, etc).

the two most likely explanations i can come up with are: 1) a helicopter with a large load slung underneath or 2) two aircraft in an air-to-air refueling operation. there are some merits to each explaination, but there are several problems with each as well. the apparent "structure" connecting the two sections was much more solid and thicker than any sling load or refueling probe i've ever seen. this structure was very distinct. plus the apparent lack of lighting and/or wings, rotors, etc. 

in short, i have no idea what i saw. but it was unusual enough in appearance that i decided to take a video of it.

happy to answer any follow up questions that may arise.
content.summary: Object appeared to be two egg-shaped objects tethered together, one above the other

content.detailedDescription:
It was rained and strong fog tonight.
i was watching sky from my balcony with my girlfriend and little niece.
i saw the strange bright shine over a construction crane in the distance.
i have long tried to understand what the object is - maybe street light or airplane or satellite or helicopter, or something else.
after it the object has divided on two parts - the first part has disappeared in few seconds, my girlfriend and little niece were afraid. i took the phone and got the photo of second object. this object was hovered over crane for few minutes. the shot was not very good in night and i have tried to get a video, but the video quality it turned out even worse. then in few minutes - the object was disappeared.
content.summary: Unidentified lights under izhevsk at night 2th july 2017

content.detailedDescription: I heard an airplane over my house so i went out to see it when i noticed something white in the sky. the plane was heading in it's direction and the white ball moved towards the plane in a smooth motion and stopped. the plane turned away to the left sharply. the plane seem lower but they had to see it. when i took off my sunglasses i couldn't see it at all. when i put them back on there it was. i lifted my sunglasses up and down and sure enough i could only see it with them on. i watched the ball slowly continue west and stop a few times when anothet smaller white object flew towards it and it swooped around it very fast in a semi circle and stopped a few times and vanished. then i ran inside to grab my phone to take pics. back outside i saw it and when i pointed my phone to take pics, it just went out of view where i could barely see it at all and then gone.
content.summary: White ball in sky only seen with sunglasses

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around the block. i had this erie feeling of some sort. i looked up toward the north and noticed a red blinking light. at first i thought it was an airplane, or then fireworks. i continued to watch, fascinated i couldn't take my eyes off what i was witnessing. several blinking ref lights were acending and descending over and over. almost forming a formation at one point. they were also blinking white. i watched for about 20-30 mins before witnessing it head over the ocean. shortly after that my entire house was shakeing due to sound of a helicopter. i went outside and a helicopter was in the air searching for something. i live right next to airport and am use to sound of planes and helicopters taking off and landing. this chopper was particularly louder than most. i walked outside and am pretty sure it wasn't a police or coast guard chopper. looked like a black hawk military helicpoter. i've been to many air and sea shows and know my planes/choppers. something was definitely fishy. so excited to see my first ufo.
content.summary: Display of lights with shifting rotation. acending and defending too fast to be a plane. not fireworks either.

content.detailedDescription: These things are going on all the time also in present and it feels like its changing the reality around me where people are reduced only to the sort of people or maybe even not people with sort of same faces which it makes me feel paranoid i dont know where to go with this but i feel i need to speak to somebody who might know whats going on maybe my and life of my family is in danger i keep seeing things like comets ball n cigar shaped things in the sky creating streams of clouds which later form all sorts of alienated faces i left my adress e-mail and mobile number so i can speak to anybody about it because who ever im trying to speak about it in the town i live denys its happening suggesting that im going crazy or something but its all real i can tell by people who are always somewhere behind my back observing these strange things going on please respond best would be sending a person i could take to where its all going on so we can catch all events on camera maybe it will putt the reality i live in back to as it was before it started going on
content.summary: I keep experiencing strange things ufo sightings in shape of whiteand black ballse leaving a cloud like trails which form all sorts of alien faced shapes in the sky in form of clouds i see birds coming out of vast space in sky i need to speak to someone

content.detailedDescription: it was july 1st at approximately 4 to 4:30 p.M. when i looked up at the sky through the break in the tree when i saw a teardrop shaped bright light, (similar color of a led light), stationary it ejected a smaller orb of same color. the large teardrop shaped ufo was moving right then left, then right again, atlast shifting upward and then it shut off or disappeared. the smaller orb was moving faster than any jet. if i had to guess it was higher then a jet liner. i tried to get a witness but every time he looked it strained his back, (he is elderly). i walked around the house and looked in the west direction when i saw another orbed light (led) moving at a very fast speed it was moving toward the north, it was approximately 10 miles i would have to guess. on another date, about 7 months ago i was heading south on i-29 south of the airport, when i looked to my left and with cloud coverage of the ufo i could see a portion of a ship, (it was hidden for the most) it was very large and had lights on the bottom, each light was almost connecting to each other. the ship was hovering and emmitting light to the edge of the cloud, it had some type of electricity enveloping the area of the ship that i could see. this ship was white in color and was disk shaped. i have experienced many different types of phenomenon for a while and i have been feeling strange so i used my cell phone to video my head when i was feeling a burning sensation, this is when i captured a "orb" of light stream to my scalp, i then pointed to where the orb had gone to, the screen of my phone was facing away from me so that i could use the light of the camera. i was sitting in the dark at the time. i also knew where orbs would appear in the room and i was capturing this on camera as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Waled outside looked up saw a tear shaped bright light eject a smaller orb of same white color

content.detailedDescription:
Events started around the end of november 2016, when i noticed 2 bright objects in the sky kind of low to the east and west.  they looked like "bright" stars that were moving around.  everytime i tried to take pictures they would make my cellphone camera go out of focus.  then started hearing low sounding helicopters which seemed to even make the house shake.  i would go out to see if i could see them but they would be leaving by the time i got outside, but would start again when i got inside.  i contacted the city and county police but when they came out to check it out, there would be nothing, but as soon as they left they would be back.  i didn't know if it was the bright objects or not because they were always there.
since then it has started doing something that hits the back of my neck that causes extreme pain.  if i leave my home it follows me and has caused vehicle engine idle & run rough causing it to slow down.  also times when if seems like my rear tire is out of balance while the vehicle is shaking.  it has happened in both my vehicles as well as my motorcycle.  all the time that these things are going on i am being shocked.
i had also started noticing that there were high electromagnetic field reading that were coming & going.  had a specialist check our electricity in the house and we have made changes that was recommended, but still getting the up and down reading.
all of this increased activity from whatever it is, is causing me problems with my heart due to increasing & decreasing heartrate, feel burning in my toes and inner leg.  it's making my eyes get really dry and go out of focus.
i'm having to deal with this now 24/7.  also my wife doesn't hear or feel these things, but recently my dog has started acting like she hears it and a couple of things has acted like she was shocked by something at the same time i was being shocked.
this is still going on so any help in getting this stopped or solved would be a blessing.
content.summary: Hovering lights, helicopter-like sounds not isolated to single area

content.detailedDescription:
Every sunday evening, my parents and i would be driving home westbound along u.S. highway 30, between 8:30 and 9:00 p.M.  as seat belts were a new thing, we did not use them.  i would frequently lie down in the back seat and look up into the sky out the side window.  there were no lights in the area, and so it was easy to observe a multitude of stars and occasionally a shooting star.

suddenly, i saw an extremely bright yellowish light, almost like a beam coming straight toward me.  i rolled over while keeping my eyes on the light, so i could get closer to the window to see it.  i had no idea what the light was, but it was so outside the normal experience that i was fascinated.

there seemed to be a solid core to the light, with a slightly less intense aura surrounding it.  the most intriguing part was three seemingly incompatible facts.  first, the light source was intensely bright and apparently very close.  the second unusual thing was that there was absolutely no sound.  the third was that the light orb, at about 40 degrees of elevation to the left of the car, was exactly keeping pace with our 55-60 miles per hour.  and as i have thought back about the experience, there was a fourth significant oddity:  my parents in the front seat seemed to be completely oblivious to what was happening.  they were keeping their eyes on the road ahead and were either quiet or were having trivial conversation.  i kept on paying attention to the light for at least a minute, perhaps as long as four minutes.  then suddenly, the light orb was gone without a trace.

i never did discuss this with my parents.  if they witnessed the event, they were trying to be calm for my sake.  but there were no glances to the left side and into the sky, to evidence that they were even aware of what was happening.  so because i was apparently the only witness, i never brought up the subject.

my basic feeling was that the experience was very cool.  i did not try to analyze it or to figure out what it was.  i was content to have witnessed something unusual which was just for me.  i was not considering the possibilities of ufos or anything like that.  it was only as time passed, and as i had more scientific education, that i began to realize the possible significance of what i saw.  i cannot say that i definitely saw a ufo.  what i can say is that i saw something airborne which defies conventional aeronautics – extremely bright and close, extremely slow (until it vanished), and entirely silent.
content.summary: Silent intense light paralleling car late at night

content.detailedDescription:
While compiling a brief report on the devastating hail storm of may 8, 2017 over denver, co, i came across this photo (attached) looking nnw across buckley afb at the approaching storm.   buckley is the primary us missile tracking station.

if you look above the left side of the geodomes on the site, close to the top of the photo, there is an apparent object that looks like a disc, edge on, angled at approximately 45*. on magnification it appears to have a central dome and retains its clean lines. this is looking in the general direction of denver international airport. however, i have been a professional observer of aircraft for many years from control towers as an air traffic controller and i don't recognize that object as an aircraft. if it is a set of wings, there is no tail assembly and the angle of bank is severe for a commercial aircraft.

i am not the owner of this photograph - it was sent to tv station kdvr who published it without acknowledgement.
content.summary: Disc-like object caught on camera over buckley afb, aurora, co

content.detailedDescription:
My mom was the witness and i'm reporting this event for her. she was in her backyard taking photos of the moon as it sat nicely just beyond the palm trees in her backyard. as she focused and snapped the first photo of the moon, she noticed a light zoom into view for a second or less as if the object got into place to be viewed in the photo. this happened so quick that the object appeared for that photo and then disappeared. she did not see any other movements except for the time it zoomed into place. it happened so fast that it was an accident on her part. 
after zooming on the photo i noticed a very bright white light lining the entire outside edge of what seems to be a disc shaped object. also, above the lights you can see a dark sloping outline and below the lights there seems to be some kind of object protruding out with more lights on it. the object could be upside down.
the object seemed to be above the clouds when viewing the photo so it is difficult to guess on the size.
content.summary: A photo was being taken of the moon then the object zoomed into the view as soon as the shutter went off. the object disappeared once picture was taken.
